shape_0_per_frame1=trans = if(equal(q3,3),1,0);
shape_0_per_frame2=a = trans;
shape_0_per_frame3=a2 = trans;
shape_0_per_frame4=border_a = trans;
shape_0_per_frame5=
shape_0_per_frame6=x = if(equal(instance,0),q1 + int(rand(15))*0.004*bass_att,x_counter+int(rand(15))*
shape_0_per_frame7=0.004*bass_att*if(below(instance,num_inst*0.5),1,-1)*if(equal(int(rand(2)),1),-1,.5));
shape_0_per_frame8=
shape_0_per_frame9=x_counter = if(equal(instance,num_inst*0.5),q1,x);
shape_0_per_frame10=
shape_0_per_frame11=y = if(equal(instance,0),q2 + int(rand(15))*0.004*bass_att,y_counter+int(rand(15))*
shape_0_per_frame12=0.004*bass_att*if(below(instance,num_inst*0.5),1,-1)*if(equal(int(rand(2)),1),-.5,1));
shape_0_per_frame13=
shape_0_per_frame14=y_counter = if(equal(instance,num_inst*0.5),q2,y);
shape_0_per_frame15=
shape_0_per_frame16=rad = .09 + .002*int(rand(10));
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=32
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=1
shapecode_1_textured=0

shapecode_1_g2=0.600

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000

shape_1_per_frame4=border_a = trans;
shape_1_per_frame5=
shape_1_per_frame6=x = if(equal(instance,0),q1 + int(rand(15))*0.004*mid_att,x_counter+int(rand(15))*
shape_1_per_frame7=0.004*mid_att*if(below(instance,num_inst*0.5),1,-1)*if(equal(int(rand(2)),1),-1,.5));
shape_1_per_frame8=
shape_1_per_frame9=x_counter = if(equal(instance,num_inst*0.5),q1,x);
shape_1_per_frame10=
shape_1_per_frame11=y = if(equal(instance,0),q2 + int(rand(15))*0.004*mid_att,y_counter+int(rand(15))*
shape_1_per_frame12=0.004*mid_att*if(below(instance,num_inst*0.5),1,-1)*if(equal(int(rand(2)),1),-.5,1));
shape_1_per_frame13=
shape_1_per_frame14=y_counter = if(equal(instance,num_inst*0.5),q2,y);
shape_1_per_frame15=
shape_1_per_frame16=rad = .09 + .002*int(rand(10));
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=32
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=1
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=16
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=0.170
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.220
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=0.120
shapecode_2_g2=0.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.200
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=trans = if(equal(q3,9),1,0);
shape_2_per_frame2=a = trans;
shape_2_per_frame3=a2 = trans;
shape_2_per_frame4=border_a = trans;
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=x = if(equal(instance,0),q1 + int(rand(15))*0.004*treb_att,x_counter+int(rand(15))*
shape_2_per_frame7=0.004*treb_att*if(below(instance,num_inst*0.5),1,-1)*if(equal(int(rand(2)),1),-1,.5));
shape_2_per_frame8=
shape_2_per_frame9=x_counter = if(equal(instance,num_inst*0.5),q1,x);
shape_2_per_frame10=
shape_2_per_frame11=y = if(equal(instance,0),q2 + int(rand(15))*0.004*treb_att,y_counter+int(rand(15))*
shape_2_per_frame12=0.004*treb_att*if(below(instance,num_inst*0.5),1,-1)*if(equal(int(rand(2)),1),-.5,1));
shape_2_per_frame13=
shape_2_per_frame14=y_counter = if(equal(instance,num_inst*0.5),q2,y);
shape_2_per_frame15=
shape_2_per_frame16=rad = .09 + .002*int(rand(10));
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=count = if(below(count,9),count+1,0);
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=q1 = 0.4 + int(rand(200))*0.001;
per_frame_4=q2 = 0.4 + int(rand(200))*0.001;
per_frame_5=q3 = count;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=loud = (bass+mid+treb)*.33;
per_frame_8=loud_att = (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*.33;
per_frame_9=zoom = 1 + 0.05*loud_att+0.005*loud;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q5 = 0.5+0.25*(sin(1.43*time)+cos(1.1*bass_att));
per_frame_12=q6 = 0.5+0.25*(sin(1.63*time)+cos(1.14*bass_att));
per_frame_13=q7 = 0.5+0.25*(sin(1.83*time)+cos(1.16*bass_att));
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // take the difference between the crisp and blurred images,
warp_7=`    // then add it back into the image.  Creates spots and stripes over time.
warp_8=`    ret += (ret - GetBlur2(uv))*0.3;
warp_9=`    ret *= 0.9;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`   // add noise:
warp_12=`   float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 0.4 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_13=`   ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0 * 122 * saturate(treb_att-1);
warp_14=`
warp_15=`   // desaturate over time, to keep the globs white
warp_16=`   ret = lerp(ret, lum(ret), 0.2);
warp_17=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`float3 base = GetPixel(uv);
comp_6=`ret = _qb.xyz*base.y;
comp_7=`ret = lerp(ret,_qb.yzx,base.x);
comp_8=`ret = lerp(ret,_qb.zxy,base.z);
comp_9=`
comp_10=`ret *= 1.75; //gamma
comp_11=`ret = min(ret,1.2-ret);
comp_12=`}
